name: The Interview (itch) (Dragon Eyes)
description:
Getting a job is not easy. You have to go through many interviews. For some it's a bit easier, for others it's hard. When you live with Tourette's you can be easily misunderstood, and even mocked by some.

It can be a rollercoaster of emotions - stress, frustration, then finally, the touching and fulfilling moment when you succeed in getting the job of your dreams!

We hope you have as much fun playing this game as we had making it.

Made by:
Frédéric Carrier - Programmer
Noeul Kang - 2D art and UI integration

Made with Unity
Music from www.bensound.com/

Game was created in 48h for GMTK20
